price: Walio kuwa kabla yao walikadhibisha , na ikawajia adhabu kutoka pahala wasipo patambua.
arabic: كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
footnotes: Walikanusha walio kuja kabla ya washirikina hawa, ikawajia adhabu kutoka upande wasio utaraji.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: kadhaba alladhīna min qablihim fa-atāhumu al-ʿadhābu min ḥaythu lā yashʿurūna
